uploadData.heading: How do you want to upload your data?
uploadData.bodyPara1: Select your data (including header row/column) in Excel or LibreOffice and paste it in the text field on the right. You can also upload a CSV or Excel file from your computer.
uploadData.bodyPara2: If you just want to try Datawrapper, hereâ€˜s a list of some example datasets you can use:

checkDescribe.heading: Make sure the data looks right

body.part1: Please make sure that Datawrapper interprets your data correctly. In the table
body.part2: columns should be shown in blue,
body.part5: cell indicates missing data or a problem in your dataset that needs to be fixed.

checkDescribe.doubleClickMessage: Double click on table rows to edit them
